Articles.Content:
Guys,

I made a machinima about Bob Kerman. It is about seven minutes long and includes characters: Bob, the KSC Director, the KSC Flight Officer, a few technitians. Bob is the only character the viewer will see; the others are portrayed through their dialogs.

I embedded a trailer showing the production:

http://youtu.be/98lyOgWr9Xo

I need volunteers to be the voice behind each character. If you are interested then send a sample to alexdatch83 at gmail.

Here are the texts I would prefer you read:

Bob: Thank you, Kerbin. Appreciate the words. (Muttering to himself) Live forever, apes.

KSC Director: Hey Jim go ahead, when you get into that rocket try not to touch things, we got you covered.

KSC Flight Officer: This is Kerbin Actual. Launch on my mark in T minus 5.

Technitian: Thruster temp crossing into the yellow zone. Thruster temp yellow.

Thanks!

I can voice a guy of your choice,just tell me w/ what emotions to voice with (worried,excited,etc.)I will send you a voice meant to be the KSC flight officer,but I say it in a more or less emotion-less tone of voice.

Final call!

We have the Technician and the Director. Need a volunteer for either Bob and / or Flight Control Officer.

Would you like to know more?

Well... Maybe....

I'll see what i can do.

Sent you something... years of psychotherapy should help you recover

Alacrity
Ohhh I can't wait to see the finished product! Cool camera work, check. Holding my lighter up to the music, check. Perked interest with the voice actors playing parts, check!

panicked amateur voice talent, rocking in the fetal position in the corner... Check

alacrity
